擅.definition: without authority; to usurp; to arrogate to oneself; to monopolize; expert in; to be good at

擅場.definition: to excel in some field; expert at sth

擅美.definition: to enjoy fame without sharing it; to take the credit

擅長.definition: to be good at; to be expert in

擅闖.definition: to enter without permission; to trespass

擅離職守.definition: to abscond; to be absent without leave
